posts.message:
GObject enables full object-orientated development in C, including object inheritance, polymorphism, and, to the extent permissible in C, data hiding.

GObject’s object-oriented interface is implemented in part by a generic, dynamic type system called GType. GType allows programmers to implement many different dynamic data types through singly-inherited class structure.

#Gobject #OOP_in_C #Dynamic_Type_C
